title: Lucian is feeling pretty healthy ;D
body:
This new update seems to work. 5.16 Has brought about a lot of learning and fun!

Does anyone know if you can lifesteal with The Culling?

replies.body:
Nah it's considered a spell so only spell vamp works on Culling's Damage, not lifesteal.

Yo check out CDR Lucian.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FAg4y2co01M
Wow that kalista gameplay was awesome
Spell vamp only still, though you can look it up in the wiki
so only spellvamp? So he gets nothing ey.. fair enough

Lucian is a prety flexiabl champ in terms of build paths as he can build AD and/or AP
im not to sure whuch abilites scale best with ap but i think it is his starburst thing

> [{quoted}](name=Angel Of Hell,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kMNE6Fy7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T23:18:12.200+0000)
>
> Lucian is a prety flexiabl champ in terms of build paths as he can build AD and/or AP
> im not to sure whuch abilites scale best with ap but i think it is his starburst thing

No one builds ap unless they are ditching the meta, an adc is still an adc (unless you are corki or ez)
i was never saying that you should build it, i was just saying it was viable
Yeah I'ver seen that video on youtube where ap lucian ult does about 16,000 damage from nashors tooth etc. They nerfed it after that
